title: Ascension and ADcs

replies.body: teemo is a disgusting trash bag, rest are fine
Don't play ADCs if you dislike douche-bag champions.

The thing about this game mode it was supposed to be improved; I have seen  nothing that has been changed; the fact that you cannot play the Champions you wish to play and Enjoy the game mode that has been set for the weekend, is pretty much lame.

And the fact that you have said this makes me want to assume you play those 'top 10' champions just to have a Victory; instead of just having fun with the Champions you like.

I'm saying that they need a buff so that /EVERYONE/ no matter who they are can enjoy this game mode for what it truly is.
They aren't going to give buffs to champions. Also, I have seen ADCs do really good. And so far I've only played my favourite champion in the game mode which I used a lot last time it was up.

They gave unique buffs to certain champions on these game modes before, it's not hard to do or change; it's something that CAN happen, it's just up to them if they want to do it;

Also; these /some/ ADCs that do good aren't against the usual top picks; that's usually in a game where everyone chose a champion they wish to play for fun.

Out of all the games I have played on Ascension this is what I believe is best. 

This is based of my opinion, and it is up to the community and the staff to see where this post leads too; it's not very hard to figure out what this post was for right?
What ADC are you trying to play? It could just be you.
Currently the ADC's I own are Ashe; Vayne; Sivir; Tristana and Varus.

Well I haven't seen an Ashe or Sivir in Ascension yet. I have seen some Vaynes and they can be really good if they know what they're doing. Every Tristana I've seen is shit. And Varus I only saw in one game and he was really good, which surprised me a lot, but I think they were just a really good Varus player.

this is the average IQ of a boards user.
someone that thinks adcs need buffs in a limited game mode that is only around for like 8 days in the year.

I disagree.

I've been playing Quinn (and ***only*** Quinn) in Ascension since it started and I've done quite well in a few of my games. Sure, I'll get "insta-killed" by any of a couple dozen champs I've seen played in the mode but fact is I'm not there to get kills, I'm there for objectives because we all know objectives>kills (and it's undeniable since a relic gives you 3 points whereas a kill only gives you 1). Mainly, I just run around securing relics which is actually great on Quinn because of the move speed from "Behind Enemy Lines".

Maybe instead of being a "kill chaser" you should realise there's more to the game than a "good" K/D/A.
